question: Can we pay Zakat to Syed people? We are Indian.
answer:
QUESTION
Imam Sahib, Can we pay Zakat to Syed people? My wife?s elder sister is poor, can we pay zakat to her, they are Syed? Also, can I pay zakat to her without mentioning that this is zakat amount? Can I pay zakat to my sister she is poor and living in our home? We are Indian. Hanafi Muslim.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Kindly refer below our standard reply to similar queries.%0D%0A2. It is permissible for you to discharge your Zakaat to your sister. You do%0D%0Anot have to tell her it's Zakaat. You may state that it is a gift to her.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai%0D%0AFATWA DEPT.%0D%0A%0D%0ANabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) mentioned, 'O Children of Hashim! Verily%0D%0AAllah Ta'ala has prohibited for you the dirty water and filth of the people%0D%0Aand given to you in exchange a 5th of the one fifth (of booty received in%0D%0Awar.' (Hidaaya vol.1 pg.206; Maktaba Ilmiyyah)%0D%0A%0D%0AIn this Hadith, Zakaat funds have been referred to us dirty water and filth%0D%0Adue to the fact that Zakaat is a purification of the wealth, removing from%0D%0Ait the dirt of any sin accruing over the year. Hashim was the great%0D%0Agrandfather of Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam). The Banu Hashim include%0D%0Anot only the descendants of Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) but the%0D%0Adescendants of Abbaas, Ali, Ja'far, Aqeel, Uthmaan, the brothers of Ali and%0D%0Athe descendants of Harith ibn Abdul Muttalib (Radhiallaahu Anhum). The Uncle%0D%0Aof Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) as well. (Ibid)%0D%0A%0D%0AOne should, however, assist them through gifts and Lillah (voluntary%0D%0Amonetary endowment solely for the pleasure of Allah). (Fataawa Mahmoodiya%0D%0Avol.7 pg.255; Mahmoodiyah)%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0A
